update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

discovery_every.title: Scan interval
discovery_every.description: Scan frequency interval (seconds) for files and directories with patterns (globs) in their paths.

files.title: File selector
files.description: Configuration for monitoring specific files. If left empy, no files will be monitored.

include.title: Include
include.description: Include files that match any of the specified include [patterns](https://golang.org/pkg/path/filepath/#Match).

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description: Exclude files that match any of the specified exclude [patterns](https://golang.org/pkg/path/filepath/#Match).

dirs.title: Directory selector
dirs.description: Configuration for monitoring specific directories. If left empy, no directories will be monitored.

collect_dir_size.title: Collect directory size
collect_dir_size.description: Enable the collection of directory sizes for each monitored directory. **Enabling this option may introduce additional overhead** on both Netdata and the host system, particularly if directories contain a large number of subdirectories and files.

include.title: Include
include.description: Include directories that match any of the specified include [patterns](https://golang.org/pkg/path/filepath/#Match).

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description: Exclude directories that match any of the specified exclude [patterns](https://golang.org/pkg/path/filepath/#Match).

files.ui:help: The logic for inclusion and exclusion is as follows: `(include1 OR include2) AND !(exclude1 OR exclude2)`.

dirs.ui:help: The logic for inclusion and exclusion is as follows: `(include1 OR include2) AND !(exclude1 OR exclude2)`.
